description: Sample learning memory for simulated tenant (PRIVACY-PRESERVING, NOT REAL DATA)

memories.title: Feature Adoption - Risk Register Usage
memories.summary: Risk register feature adoption: 78% of users access weekly, 45% add new risks monthly (n=45 users, 90 days)
memories.author: runtime

details.rationale: Understand feature usage to improve UX
details.context: Aggregated usage pattern from 45 users over 90 days
details.privacy_notes: No user identifiers, no specific timestamps, aggregate statistics only

insights.improvement_opportunity: Risk impact calculator rarely used (12%), may need better visibility

memories.title: Workflow Insight - Policy Review Cycle
memories.summary: Policy review workflow: 85% completed within 7 days, 15% require extension (n=20 reviews)
memories.author: runtime

details.privacy_notes: No policy names, no reviewer names, no specific dates
